title: ‘It Wasn’t a Lack of Balls, It Was Smart Racing’: Vingegaard Slaps Back at Tour de France Critics Pogačar, Evenepoel
content:
Defending champion defends negative racing in stage 9's gravel rumble, insists title defense isn't over: 'I'm getting better and better.'

Read the full article at ‘It Wasn’t a Lack of Balls, It Was Smart Racing’: Vingegaard Slaps Back at Tour de France Critics Pogačar, Evenepoel on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
